Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4484 WILSHIRE BOULEVARD, LOS ANGELES, California, 90010, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Mercury General Corp is an insurance holding company operating in the property-casualty market, where it focuses on low-cost auto insurance for individuals, with operations in nearly 13 United States of America states. However, its business--about 75% of premiums--comes from California, where it was established by George Joseph, the current company chairman and majority owner. Its insurance is distributed exclusively through independent agents.
